verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of David.<WH1732> Hear<WH8085> my prayer,<WH8605> O LORD,<WH3068> give ear<WH238> to my supplications:<WH8469> in your faithfulness<WH530> answer<WH6030> me, and in your righteousness.<WH6666>
And enter<WH935> not into judgment<WH4941> with your servant:<WH5650> for in your sight<WH6440> shall no<WH3808> man living<WH2416> be justified.<WH6663>

For the enemy<WH341> has persecuted<WH7291> my soul;<WH5315> he has smitten<WH1792> my life<WH2416> down to the ground;<WH776> he has made me to dwell<WH3427> in darkness,<WH4285> as those that have been long<WH5769> dead.<WH4191>
Therefore is my spirit<WH7307> overwhelmed<WH5848> within<WH5921> me; my heart<WH3820> within<WH8432> me is desolate.<WH8074>
I remember<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of old;<WH6924> I meditate<WH1897> on all<WH3605> your works;<WH6467> I muse<WH7878> on the work<WH4639> of your hands.<WH3027>
I stretch<WH6566> forth my hands<WH3027> to you: my soul<WH5315> thirsts after you, as a thirsty land.<WH776> Selah.<WH5542>

Hear<WH6030> me speedily,<WH4118> O LORD:<WH3068> my spirit<WH7307> fails:<WH3615> hide<WH5641> not your face<WH6440> from me, lest I be like<WH4911> to them that go<WH3381> down<WH3381> into the pit.<WH953>

Cause me to hear<WH8085> your loving kindness<WH2617> in the morning;<WH1242> for in you do I trust:<WH982> cause me to know<WH3045> the way<WH1870> wherein<WH2098> I should walk;<WH3212> for I lift<WH5375> up my soul<WH5315> to you.
Deliver<WH5337> me, O LORD,<WH3068> from my enemies:<WH341> I flee<WH3680> to you to hide<WH3680> me.
Teach<WH3925> me to do<WH6213> your will;<WH7522> for you are my God:<WH430> your spirit<WH7307> is good;<WH2896> lead<WH5148> me into the land<WH776> of uprightness.<WH4334>
Quicken<WH2421> me, O LORD,<WH3068> for your name's<WH8034> sake: for your righteousness'<WH6666> sake bring<WH3318> my soul<WH5315> out of trouble.<WH6869>
And of your mercy<WH2617> cut<WH6789> off my enemies,<WH341> and destroy<WH6> all<WH3605> them that afflict<WH6887> my soul:<WH5315> for I am your servant.<WH5650>
